website_summaries.verdict: This is an impressive pick for a detoxifying mask for those who are looking to rid their face of puffiness while also drawing out impurities.
pros: This gel mask is impressive for being a cruelty-free product,  containing a wealth of natural ingredients
Gentle enough to use on a daily basis yet still delivers results when used only on occasion
Works well to reduce puffiness around eyes
cons: Some users find the smell of this mask overpowering

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I used this to help cool my skin after using the Via Cosmedics Exfoliating and Clarifying Ultra Mud mask. It has aloe, chamomile, etc and really did a good job to ease redness and burning after using a harsh treatment on the face. The product dries after a few minutes so you can leave it on for as long as you want. I leave it overnight after using the mask and just use a mild cleanser in the morning before I do my makeup routine. My skin generally gets really oily in the summer months so I don't use a facial moisturizer as much. This gel makes up for the moisture lost. Highly recommended!!
customer_reviews.author: Mia

customer_reviews.title: Great product, will buy again.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing. The first time I wore it, I saw you could leave it on overnight and figured I'd give it a shot. I was surprised by how quickly it dried and how comfortable it was. When I woke up the next morning, my skin was softer than it ever has been. The consistency is a little strange at first, but it smells great and is easy to put on. You can feel the difference instantly. Will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Miles Buckley

customer_reviews.title: Feels AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: This feels AMAZING on your skin!! I’ve been having severe dry skin problems this summer and red patches all over my face, this is only my 3rd use and I can already feel and see a difference. It’s very cooling not to sticky and just feels like butter going on your skin. Will buy again. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Dimples_101

customer_reviews.title: Love this Mask
customer_reviews.text: This is my first experience with Via Cosmetics Products I have combination skin that tends to get very dry in the winter months. The first thing I noticed about the Gel was the Amazing smell and it actually feels like it starts soothing my skin as soon as I started applying it.The instructions say leave it on for 10-20 minutes I left it on for the full 20 minutes I noticed a improvement after my first use and my skin definitely felt more hydrated.I am very impressed with this product and look forward to trying there other products as well.
customer_reviews.author: Heather B

customer_reviews.title: A necessity for your skin care routine!
customer_reviews.text: The Sea Whip Cucumber Detox Soothing Gel is the first VIA product that I have tried, but it will not be the last! I love this product. My face tends to get red and dry in the colder months and this gel felt amazing and really helped alleviate those problems. My skin felt refreshed after just one use and the redness was pretty much gone. It is very sticky so I don't think I could comfortably leave it on overnight for a "more intense treatment" but I found that leaving it on for 20 minutes worked great. As I mentioned, it is sticky but it feels so soothing once it's on. A great product at a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Queen Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Gentle- Does not irritate my rosacea
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only used this once so far but it felt good while on my face. The gel is very thick and creates a nice mask. Also, I’m scent sensitive & the scent of this product is noticeable but isn’t overpowering. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: PeggyTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this stuff. I have sensitive skin, dermatillomania and a lot of trouble with inflammation when my skin is angry. This cools, hydrates and soothes my face. I like how it isn't extremely obvious I have a facial on, too. I can clean house or nap comfortably with it on.
customer_reviews.author: A.L.

customer_reviews.title: Mmmmm soothing!
customer_reviews.text: I've used this gel twice daily for a little more than a week and can honestly say that I enjoy it. My skin feels and looks smoother and more hydrated. The gel has a pleasant scent to it, kind of minty and floral. Very clean, spa-like. Even twice daily, I haven't really dented the surface of the jar. There's so much! I will most likely repurchase. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Nichole

customer_reviews.title: Great product for Rosacea!!
customer_reviews.text: Okay, so I have type 2 rosacea (redness and pustules) I also have very dry/flaky skin - since changing to organic shampoo and using this cucumber soothing mask after my showers my complexion has definitely improved. Of course I still have redness as there's no cure for rosacea, but I'm less red and I haven't had any pustules at all!! This mask is very hydrating and keeps my skin soft, no more dry/flaky skin! This has allowed me to apply makeup much easier. Love this product and will be a loyal customer!
customer_reviews.author: Milissa Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this a few times a week for about two weeks now and can already see change in my skin. I have been sleeping with it on my face at night and rinse in the morning. Im going to purchase as a gift for my mom as well. Very happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: MsyS23

customer_reviews.title: Not for me...
customer_reviews.text: Saw promising reviews on this mask so I was excited to try it. Very cooling on my skin but it made my entire face breakout in a acne rash. Took over 2 months to get my skin back to normal. Just not a match for my sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Soft skin and not greasy it gets sticky
customer_reviews.text: To add moidture to skin without bring greasy but it makes face to be sticky
customer_reviews.author: Diane Hargis

customer_reviews.title: Jelly of joy
customer_reviews.text: Really takes down redness and cools my face immediately. After a hot day, this is a holy grail product. I use it as a spot treatment on pimples too and it soothes well
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second jar! I have been using it at night and wash it off in the morning. My skin has been really smooth and no irritation whatsoever. I have very sensitive skin ( grew up with eczema), hence I am very careful choosing any skin product. I check all the ingredients being used, and I feel safe to use it for my teenager. It has cooling effect and really feel great to apply after getting tons of sun during summer. I am going to need one more for the summer. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: MO

customer_reviews.title: It does smell good and clean and goes on nice not sticky or ...
customer_reviews.text: I've only been using for less than a week, so far I haven't noticed my redness to lessen. It does smell good and clean and goes on nice not sticky or tacky. My face does feel moisturized so I'm happy about that. I would recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Kdawg

customer_reviews.title: DIdn't Like Fragrance
customer_reviews.text: Felt nice/tingly, but didn't notice much "puffiness" improvement in part because of the fragrance...which makes my eyes puffy.
customer_reviews.author: ChrisNY

customer_reviews.title: Steer clear! This is horrible!!
customer_reviews.text: I do not know how this got 4.5 stars!!! This was absolutely horrible!! It was super super sticky and never actually dried! So I couldn't do the overnight on it and it did absolutely nothing to my face when I washed it off.It didn't even feel soft or anything. This is horrible! Steer clear! I'm returning. ...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice product!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product. I kept it in the refrigerator, and it is really comfortable to apply it on my face. I use it after shower and rinse it off before sleep. I feel my skin more smooth and hydrated after more than 1 week use.
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice and natural, but it's small and the Philip Thomas Roth Cucumber Mask s much better. Just ok.

customer_reviews.title: Lovely, smooth, silky, I love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I really do like this. It's very soothing and it helps with the redness of my face. I have to use gentle moisturizers and face wash and this wasn't irritating at all. I am definitely buying more soon.
customer_reviews.author: Janessa

customer_reviews.title: Better than Sephora
customer_reviews.text: Completely obsessed with this! I usually buy products through Sephora but none of their face lotions have been helping with my acne and my peeling dry face. I read about this and decided to try this and now I will never buy anything else!
customer_reviews.author: Tatiana Hill

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: I've had rosacea all my life and this product has been the best thing for it. It's been better than my high-end products. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: John H Lucas III

customer_reviews.title: It’s perfect for sunburns
customer_reviews.text: This one of the most soothing things I’ve ever put on my face. It’s perfect for sunburns, puffy skin, or just giving your skin a moisturizing pick me up. Keep it chilled in the fridge to get the maximum benefit.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Crowell

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Hydrates the skin. Does not bother my sensitive skin. I use once or twice per week and works great!

customer_reviews.title: it does what it says on the label and leaves your skin feeling great!
customer_reviews.text: Incredible mask, it does what it says on the label and leaves your skin feeling great!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's really good, helping my face skin much more smooth and shinning, The only one problem is "Too Pricy".

customer_reviews.title: very good produce that i have never seen
customer_reviews.text: I really love this produce, it made my face soft ,clear and redness, irritated go away ..i wanna to order again when it run out.. Love u sea whip cucumber detox soothing gel

customer_reviews.title: Product arrived very quickly and I love the product itself
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived very quickly and I love the product itself! It's very gentle and effectively "resets" my skin each time I use it.

customer_reviews.title: Very refreshing, good for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: Love this! I have super sensitive skin and was worried that this might have too strong of a tingling sensation. But it left no redness and left my skin with a nice glow. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Thrifty Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up!
customer_reviews.text: T love this product. The cucumber extract is very soothing to skin and has a pleasant fragrance. I will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it works great! )
customer_reviews.text: Worked very well to calm red irritated skin, and would use it again. Skin feels soft and hydrated after. Would give it a 5, were it not for the fact that it strangely seems to evaporate in a closed jar over a couple of weeks to almost nothing. So it is a "5" for a quick fix for inflamed or irritated skin (yes, it works great!), but use it well and quickly within a short matter of a couple weeks, else it "disappears" in the jar.
customer_reviews.author: SiliconValleyGirl

customer_reviews.title: Redness amplifier
customer_reviews.text: This product is highly perfumed and I had an allergic reaction to it, which completely defeated the purpose of reducing redness. Generally products that say 'cucumber' have a generally mild scent, but this has a strong scent and nothing like cucumber. This made my redness work. I wouldn't recommend to anyone with sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I use this 2x per week, at night, and I sleep in it. I keep it in the frig because I like the cooling effect but the product is cooling even without this. So far, my skin has been awesome and breakouts have disappeared. I recommended this product to friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: R. Stewart

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is amazing for dry and super dry skin
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing for dry and super dry skin. I apply it every night after revving my make up and washing my face and I usually leave it on overnight. My skin wakes up unbelievably soft and moisturized. I love this gel and definitely recommend it for anyone with dry skin!
customer_reviews.author: A. Daniela

customer_reviews.title: TURNED MY SKIN GREEN
customer_reviews.text: I was super excited to try this new mask and it TURNED MY SKIN GREEN. Hilarious? Yes. Humiliating? Also yes. It took almost 4 days for my skin to get back to its normal color and that was after scrubbing my face so much that it was almost raw. I'm so disappointed and am terrified to ever try this again. I have normal skin, sometimes a little oily even so I have no idea wtf happened or why.
customer_reviews.author: Talia Holzman-Castellands

customer_reviews.title: ... using the MegaMud clay mask and it was the perfect finish to the mask
customer_reviews.text: I used this product after using the MegaMud clay mask and it was the perfect finish to the mask. I actually left this product on overnight and washed off in the morning and my skin felt the softest it has ever felt! It has a slight cooling effect after using the mud mask and I just loved that feeling. It was quickly shipped and I am very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Sheshe4

customer_reviews.title: This gel soothes redness and calms the skin. I ...
customer_reviews.text: This gel soothes redness and calms the skin. I haven't left it on all night though. I'm generous with the application and wouldn't try to sleep in it.
customer_reviews.author: Marsha

customer_reviews.title: Very temporary benefits
customer_reviews.text: I have red, hyper reactive skin and mild acne. This product offers temporary relief (read: a couple hours, max) but has not shown any long term benefits. However, I have liked that the mask is exfoliating, because face scrubs are too harsh for my skin. I likely will not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin

customer_reviews.title: Nice to have on hand if you forget to reapply ...
customer_reviews.text: The gel is very thick, clearly not watered down which I really appreciate! Use a toner first to help the product spread and absorb and a little bit goes a long way. Nice to have on hand if you forget to reapply sunscreen on vacation. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Nya & Tyson

customer_reviews.title: hydrating and cooling!!
customer_reviews.text: amazing product. makes my skin feel amazing. very dry sensitive skin and this is great after the shower while putting body lotion on, then rinse off and apply moisturizer.

customer_reviews.title: I bought this as a anti-irritation mask after sun burn ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a anti-irritation mask after sun burn. It did not give me any trouble but neither did any thing beneficial on my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Tange

customer_reviews.title: hydrating gel
customer_reviews.text: Fast service. Quick delivery. This stuff is amazing. A friend hooked me up once and once I put it on it seemed to cool very fast on face and left my face energized. Hydrated. Wonderful item.
customer_reviews.author: Doreen Schram

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Good product especially for oily skin. I have oily skin and usually after washing my face in about 2 hours whole face was oily and shiny. After I started using this gel the my face feels clean, soft and what's more important not greasy. would reccomend.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.text: I'm on my third one. I put it on almost daily. It eases my redness a bit, and makes my skin look healthy.

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Hydrating and soothing for my retin a sensitive skin. However, the smell is too fragranced for me.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.text: It calms my skin and seems to help heal acne-even under the surface inflamation.

customer_reviews.text: It works nicely enough. It is a bit sticky and it smells nice. I use it for my radio frequency machine, but it dries too quickly. I won't order again. But not a horrible product. Just not what I expected.

customer_reviews.title: Good Stuff!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been applying this product after using the MegaMud. It's a great compliment to the anti-aging mask. Leaves my skin feeling ultra soft and smooth.

product_meta.title: Sea Whip Cucumber Detox Soothing Gel - Enhanced with hyaluronic, marigold, and argan oil
feature_bullets: Sea whip extract comes from the organism Pseudopterogoria Elisabethae, a marine organism found in coral reefs. It provides excellent protective and soothing enzymes that help minimize irritation and reduce redness. It has been shown to have anti-inflammatory properties which make it ideal in helping damaged or sensitive skin.

Allantoin can be made synthetically and is also naturally found in a variety of plants. It is known for its wound healing, moisturizing, and anti-aging benefits. It is typically used in products as a conditioning agent because of its hydrating and nourishing benefits.

Hyalyronic acid helps promote supple, soft skin and can help long term with aging as it intensely aids in hydration. With the impressive ability to absorb up to 1000 times its weight in water, hyaluronic acid is a favorite performance ingredient to improve moisture and balance in the skin.

Marigold, or calendula extract or oil, is often used in products aimed to soothe and heal the skin. It has been shown to be effective in improving wound repair and in calming irritated skin. It has anti-fungal and anti-inflammatory properties and also protects against photoaging.

Argan oil, pressed from the kernel of the argan tree in Morocco is full of inflammation fighting vitamin E and omega fatty acids that work to soften dry patches, hydrate, and refine the skin tone appearance.
